certificateArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the certificate.

certificateId.description:
The certificate identifier.

- Must contain from 1 to 255 alphanumeric characters and hyphens.

certificatePem.description: The contents of the .pem X.509 certificate file for the certificate. Either `certificate_pem` or `certificate_wallet` must be set.

certificateWallet.description: The contents of the Oracle Wallet certificate for use with SSL, provided as a base64-encoded String. Either `certificate_pem` or `certificate_wallet` must be set.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Certificate resources.
